com.group10b.blueka.bluetooth

Class BleScanner

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.group10b.blueka.bluetooth.BleScanner

  • public class BleScanner
extends java.lang.Object
    A wrapper for all the functionality of scanning. The application will first be a scanner using this class BleScanner to scan. If nothing is scanned, then the application will be a advertiser using BleAdvertiser. The app is expected to actively use one class at a time.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  BleScanner.GattClientCallback
      This abstract class is used to implement BluetoothGatt callbacks.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BleScanner

        public BleScanner(android.content.Context context)
        An constructor for the class, set up all the components needed for Bluetooth scanner.
        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • startScanning

        public void startScanning(ScanResultsConsumer scan_results_consumer,
                          long stop_after_ms)
        MainActivity can call this method to let the scanner start scanning.
        Parameters:
        scan_results_consumer - An interface to trigger methods in MainActivity to control user interface.
        stop_after_ms - The duration of scanning.

      • stopScanning

        public void stopScanning()
        MainActivity can call this method to let the scanner stop scanning.

      • connectDevice

        private void connectDevice(android.bluetooth.BluetoothDevice device)
        A method for scanner to connected the scanned device.
        Parameters:
        device - The device to connect.

      • isScanning

        public boolean isScanning()
        A method to check the scanning status of the scanner.
        Returns:
        true if the scanner is scanning.

      • setScanning

        private void setScanning(boolean scanning)
        A method to set boolean value of scanning
        Parameters:
        scanning - the boolean value representing the status of scanning. Will be set the true when scanning.

      • disconnectGattServer

        public void disconnectGattServer()
        A method to disconnect the gatt server connected.

      • getClientMusicTime

        public long getClientMusicTime(long timestamp)
        This method takes as parameter the atomic time at which the server shall play the snippet and uses that timestamp to compute the time at which the client should play the snippet.
        Parameters:
        timestamp - Atomic time at which the server device is set to play the music
        Returns:
        The system time at which the client device shall play the music
